recipes.label: Arrange an alliance with local Soviet forces
recipes.startdescription: They don't like us - but they're also hungry and desperate. They'll come to the table, and a deal will be struck.
recipes.description: The contingent leader and I do not shake hands, but he gives me a terse nod before leaving. They'll come when I call.

recipes.label: Heal my Wound
recipes.description: Time passes in the medic's tent, and then I am returned to the field.

recipes.label: Provide medical attention to a wounded ally
recipes.startdescription: Morphine and stitches. Saws, if necessary.
recipes.description: And done. They'll live to fight another day.

recipes.label: Provide medical attention to a wounded ally
Send scouts to learn the measure of the land
recipes.startdescription:
The broad movements of the sky and the air can threaten the unprepared, but my scouts can devise a way to turn even this to our advantage.

[This will convert a Hindrance into a useful Opportunity.]
recipes.description: There is a way to turn everything into a tool - a weapon.

recipes.label: Order repairs on damaged machinery
recipes.startdescription: Mending steel isn't always simpler than mending flesh, but with the proper tools it is a job like any other.
recipes.description: And done. These engines of war are returned to fighting order.
